law.text: Any person who violates subsection (3) of KRS 256.120 shall be fined one dollar ($1) for each day, after the expiration of the time in which the fence should have been constructed, until the fence is constructed.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1791.
